definitions.definition: On the aft side; in the stern .
examples: We drifted with the wind abaft .
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the early 17 century.
Attested from around (1150 to 1350) until the late 15 century.

main_definition: ( nautical ) On the aft side; in the stern . [First attested in the early 17 century.]
secondary_definitions: ( nautical , obsolete ) Backwards. [Attested from around (1150 to 1350) until the late 15 century.]
